column3: @randolf Good point about RAII. Fixed. Please re-review :-)
@practicalswift I don't see the fix yet, but perhaps GitHub just needs some time to synchronize.  I'll check again later and approve once the fix appears.  Thanks for the quick turn-around.
@practicalswift I just asked some other developers about this, and they suspect that you may need to "push" your changes so that they'll appear here.
@randolf Oh, I forgot to push after changing. Thanks for letting me know! Please re-review :-)
Travis fails with `FAIL: subtree directory was touched without subtree merge`
Removed the change to `src/univalue/` since that one should be reported upstream instead.\n\nPlease re-review :-)
